Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians and Tigers face off for the final time in the American League Division Series with the winner advancing to face the Yankees in the ALCS beginning Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Progressive Field at 1:08 p.m. ET.
The game will be broadcast on TBS, MAX, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, WARF 1350 AM (Spanish) and the Guardians Radio Network.
Others: The Guardians are currently 2-2 in the series, while the Tigers are 4-2.
